394040.name: AIPD - Soundtrack
394040.description:
This is the official AIPD soundtrack, written, composed and produced by Matthew Tasa and Krystian Kozlowski.

Track list:

01. A star is rising (Intro) - 1:58
02. The hunt - 3:02
03. Challenge of fear - 3:08
04. Broken wings - 2:30
05. Dangerzone - 3:00
06. War machines - 2:15
07. Attack of the drones - 3:04
08. AI strikes back - 2:30
09. The grid - 2:59
10. A new challenger - 2:26
11. Bladerunner - 3:16
12. Borders of the galaxy - 3:45
13. Finale - 3:04
14. Two ways to go (Outro) - 1:35

Total length: approx. 38 minutes

Join the AIPD in the fight against evil AIs! Engage in thrilling arcade co-op battles against hundreds of enemy programs. Enjoy almost unlimited gameplay with more than 100,000 game modes and a huge arsenal of powerful and effective weapons. Enter the fascinating neon world of artificial intelligence.
394040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
